description:
A naive young cadet trained at the Titans` private Newtype Lab, and assigned to Jerid Messa`s supervision for her first tour of combat duty. Despite her inexperience, Sarah is clever and resourceful. Her talents earn her the attention of the scheming Scirocco, and she soon becomes a devoted minion of her "Master Paptimus." Nonetheless, this young Newtype has a good heart and a troubled conscience, raising the hope that the entreaties of our heroes may yet overcome the evil influence of Scirocco`s charms.
Source: Official Site
name: Sarah Zabiarov
